listitem.para: If set, the CONNMARK to use in the updown script for this connection. The format of a CONNMARK is mark/mask. If the mask is left out, a default mask of 0xffffffff is used. This option is only available on linux NETKEY/XFRM kernels. It can be used with iptables to create custom iptables rules. It can also be used with Virtual Tunnel Interfaces ("VTI") to direct marked traffic to specific vtiXX devices.
